messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com

I renounce my involvement in sexual sin I submit my sexuality to Jesus Christ to be purified I renounce and ask God to remove all narcissistic traits from my DNA and from my soul and will I renounce all involvement with fornication adultery harlotry homosexuality and pornography I repent of those sins and I ask for God to help me be free from those sins

It's wonderful to hear your commitment to renounce those sins and seek purification through Jesus Christ. We are here to support you in your journey towards healing. Would you like to share a specific prayer request or need guidance on how to pray about your struggles?

Thank you for sharing your prayer request. We are here to pray with you and for you. Please know that you are not alone in this journey. Would you like me to guide you through a specific prayer or provide some scriptures to help you in your prayer?

Here’s a prayer you can use as a guide:

"Dear Lord, I come before You with a humble heart, seeking Your forgiveness and healing. I renounce all involvement in sexual sin and ask for Your purification in my life. Please remove any traits that do not align with Your will and help me to turn away from fornication, adultery, harlotry, homosexuality, and pornography. I repent of these sins and ask for Your strength to overcome them. Fill me with Your Holy Spirit and guide me on the path of righteousness. Thank You for Your grace and love. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen."

You can also meditate on scriptures like:

- 1 John 1:9: "If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness."
- Psalm 51:10: "Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me."

Feel free to reach out if you need more support or resources!

I confess that I don't know how to be a Godly and faithful husband but I lean the Holy Spirit to help me to be faithful I renounce and forsake all involvement with anyone outside my marriage from this day forward I submit to the spirit of holiness to help me walk in holiness so I am able to please God I forsake and renounce all thoughts that satan tries to bring my way

It's wonderful to hear your commitment to seeking holiness and faithfulness in your marriage. Remember, you are not alone in this journey. Leaning on the Holy Spirit for strength and guidance is a powerful step. 

If you'd like, I can share a prayer that aligns with your intentions. Here’s a prayer you can use:

"Heavenly Father, I come before you today, renouncing all involvement outside my marriage. I submit myself to the Spirit of holiness and ask for your strength to walk in purity. Help me to forsake all thoughts that do not align with your will. Fill me with your Holy Spirit, and guide me in my journey to be a faithful husband. In Jesus' name, Amen."

Feel free to reach out if you need further support or guidance!
I release all bitterness anger resentment jealousy and hard heartedness

That's a powerful declaration! Releasing bitterness, anger, resentment, jealousy, and hard-heartedness is an important step towards healing and freedom. 

You might consider praying something like this:

"Heavenly Father, I release all bitterness, anger, resentment, jealousy, and hard-heartedness from my heart. I ask for your healing touch to cleanse me and fill me with your love and peace. Help me to walk in forgiveness and grace, reflecting your character in my life. In Jesus' name, Amen."

If you need more support or resources, just let me know!

I pray that my existence would be God honoring I pray that I would live my life in away that brings me peace and brings God honor I repent and confess that my words honor God but my heart has been far from him following my own sinful desires and lies

It's commendable that you desire to honor God with your life and seek true repentance. A prayer reflecting your heart could be:

"Dear Lord, I pray that my existence would be God-honoring. Help me to live in a way that brings me peace and glorifies You. I confess that while my words may honor You, my heart has often strayed, following my own sinful desires and lies. I repent and ask for Your forgiveness. Please cleanse my heart and draw me closer to You. In Jesus' name, Amen."

If you need further guidance or support, feel free to reach out!

I want to forsake the life of lies and deception and manipulation and I want to embrace truth and holy living and truly knowing and obeying God and his word I confess that my sins has separated me from God I want to embrace his word and live accordingly

It's wonderful to hear your desire to forsake lies and embrace truth and holy living. A prayer that reflects your commitment could be:

"Lord, I want to forsake the life of lies, deception, and manipulation. I long to embrace truth and live a life that is holy and pleasing to You. I confess that my sins have separated me from You, and I desire to draw near to You. Help me to truly know and obey Your Word, and guide me in living according to Your will. In Jesus' name, Amen."

If you need more resources or support on this journey, just let me know!
